title: The Culmination of Avalon City
author: VD
content_html:
CHUCK DIXON’S AVALON Episode 105: The Grand Finale

上嫁小鼠 Episode 2: 小干酪一碟

BEN GARRISON Episode 103: Wrong Way Joe

CHUCK DIXON PRESENTS: ADVENTURE Episode 74: The Brigand

STONETOSS Episode 185: Autocomplete

RIOT TOWN, USA Episode 18: Fascism is Not to be Debated

BOB Episode 133: Facemask How To

UNITED FORCES Episode 3: Come On Viktor Move It

A MIND PROGRAMMED Episode 21: A World in Miniature

Today marks the end, for now, of CHUCK DIXON’S AVALON. It’s the only series that started when the site launched and ran every week, without fail, for two years straight. And it goes out with an unexpected bang that even those who haven’t been reading it will appreciate. The 12-issue omnibus is now complete and will be shipped out to the backers in the coming months. Also, STONETOSS is particularly savage today.

DISCUSS ON SG
